text: Augustus Benton "Ben" Chafin Jr. (May 18, 1960 â€“ January 1, 2021) was an American lawyer, farmer, and politician. He was a member of the Republican Party. He was born in Abingdon, Virginia. In 2014, he was a member of the Virginia House of Delegates. From 2014 until his death, he was a member of the State Senate. Chafin died on January 1, 2021 at a hospital in Richmond, Virginia from problems caused by COVID-19 at the age of 60. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Virginia
